original_text: He was wiser than any other man. This includes Ethan the Ezrahite, as well as Heman, Calcol and Darda, the sons of Mahol. Solomon was famous in all the nations around Israel.
korean_text: 그는 모든 사람보다 지혜로워서 예스라 사람 에단과 마홀의 아들 헤만과 갈골과 다르다보다 나으므로 그의 이름이 사방 모든 나라에 들렸더라

sentences.original_text: He was wiser than any other man.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 어떤 사람보다 더 지혜로웠습니다.

sentences.original_text: as well as Heman, Calcol and Darda,
in all the nations around Israel.
